short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The dopest chat extension for FB Gaming livestreams!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The browser extension aims to improve the chat experience by adding custom emotes, adjusting the chat appearance, and incorporating various quality of life enhancements and tweaks.
